channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

item.description:

End Time : 08/04/2022 17:50 UTC

Update - The following racks have access difficulties: T05A31, T05A32, T05A12, T05A24, T04C24, T05D26, T05A34.
We apologize for the inconvenience caused

Investigating - Start time : 08/04/2022 16:15 UTC

Ongoing actions : Our teams investigate the origin of the incident

item.title: [GRA2][Dedicated servers] - G223A13
item.description:
Apr 8, 16:00 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 08/04/2022 11:29 UTC
End Time : 08/04/2022 15:51 UTC
Service impact : None
Root cause : Human error
Incident is fixed. Everything is back to normal.

Apr 8, 12:02 UTC
Identified - Start time : 08/04/2022 11:29 UTC
Service impact : 5 servers down in rack G223A13
Root cause : Incident is due to a leak.
Ongoing actions : Our teams have fixed the leak . The servers are are currently being re-commissioned.

The incident is over, all servers are available again.

item.description:
Apr 8, 08:46 UTC
Resolved - End time : 08/04/2022 07:50 UTC
Root cause : The incident was caused by a leak.

All racks are OK, incident is over.

Apr 8, 07:22 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 08/04/2022 07:17 UTC
Service impact : 121 servers unavailable on racks R808L07 / R808L08 / R808L09
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently identifying the cause of this unavailability. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.

item.title: [SYD][DNS][Virtual Private Servers - Network] -Failure access to services due to update configuration on network devices
item.description:
Apr 7, 20:49 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 07/04/2022 17:53 UTC
End Time : 07/04/2022 18:52 UTC
Service impact : Following an error occurred during this maintenance Incident link: we encounted various services failure like :
- Failed to apply catalog:
- Failed to open TCP connection to eu.api.ovh.com:443 (getaddrinfo: Name or service not known). Our team has performed a rollback that allowed the restoration of all services. All services are now operational again. We apologize for the inconvenience.
